content:
I made this website using Next.js and React Query in the frontend, and MongoDB and Firebase (for image storage) in the backend. Additionally, I used NextAuth for the authentication system.

You can find this project's GitHub repository by clicking on the navbar icon or by visiting this link:

https://github.com/yonext24/twitter-clone

Also, you can check out my portfolio at:
https://yonathan-portfolio.netlify.app/
